Class KubernetesCreator

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.KubernetesCreator
public final class KubernetesCreator extends Object
The desired state of a Kubernetes cluster.

    • autoUpgrade

      public KubernetesCreator autoUpgrade(boolean autoUpgrade)
      Determines the cluster's auto-upgrade policy. By default, this property is false.
      Parameters:
      autoUpgrade - true if the cluster will be automatically upgraded to new patch releases during its maintenance schedule.
      Returns:
      this

    • autoUpgrade

      public boolean autoUpgrade()
      Determines if the cluster will be automatically upgraded to new patch releases during its maintenance schedule.
      Returns:
      true if the cluster will be automatically upgraded to new patch releases during its maintenance schedule.

    • surgeUpgrade

      public KubernetesCreator surgeUpgrade(boolean surgeUpgrade)
      Determines if new nodes should be deployed before destroying the outdated nodes. This speeds up cluster upgrades and improves their reliability. By default, this property is false.
      Parameters:
      surgeUpgrade - true if new nodes should be deployed before destroying the outdated nodes
      Returns:
      this

    • surgeUpgrade

      public boolean surgeUpgrade()
      Determines if new nodes should be deployed before destroying the outdated nodes. This speeds up cluster upgrades and improves their reliability. By default, this property is false.
      Returns:
      true if new nodes should be deployed before destroying the outdated nodes

    • highAvailability

      public KubernetesCreator highAvailability(boolean highAvailability)
      Determines if the control plane should run in a highly available configuration. This creates multiple backup replicas of each control plane component and provides extra reliability for critical workloads. Highly available control planes incur less downtime. Once enabled, this feature cannot be disabled.
      Parameters:
      highAvailability - true if the control plane should run in a highly available configuration
      Returns:
      this

    • highAvailability

      public boolean highAvailability()
      Determines if the control plane should run in a highly available configuration. This creates multiple backup replicas of each control plane component and provides extra reliability for critical workloads. Highly available control planes incur less downtime. Once enabled, this feature cannot be disabled.
      Returns:
      true if the control plane should run in a highly available configuration

    • create

      public CreateResult<Kubernetes> create() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new cluster.
      Returns:
      the new or conflicting cluster
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a cluster with this name already exists
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • copyUnchangeablePropertiesFrom

      public void copyUnchangeablePropertiesFrom(Kubernetes existingCluster)
      Copies unchangeable properties from an existing cluster into this configuration. Certain properties cannot be altered once the cluster is created, and this method ensures these properties are retained.
      Parameters:
      existingCluster - the existing cluster
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if existingCluster is null
